Name: Dophert
Review Text: Great tasty wholesome WFPB options on the menu that are prepared in a speedy manner with care for the produce.  Pleasant environment to have lunch or just beverages with one of the scrumptious Vegan homemade cakes that people literally ‚Ä¶

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Very creative vegan menu! The presentation is nice! I would recommend the berry chocolate smoothie and the no tuna melt! The ‚Äòtuna‚Äô is so good! It does taste like tuna but you will still know it is made with chickpeas and jackfruit

Name: Dophert
Review Text: This place was in our list to visit in Amsterdam, we trekked in the rain for a while to get to it. Had my first crossaint in years as a vegan and I wasn't disappointed. They had amazing cakes and drinks. They also had lots of vegan ‚Ä¶

Name: Dophert
Review Text: I have been living near this place for almost a year now and this is the first time I decided to try it out. I wished I had gone there sooner. ‚Ä¶

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Amazing food, really tasty. Lovely atmosphere and really amazing friendly staff. I would (will) go there again and again!! Buy ALL THE CAKES!!

Name: Dophert
Review Text: As a meat eater, this is one of most satisfying vegan places in amsterdam. Mostly sandwichy options, (Tempe Vietnamese baguette, avocado Tempe club sandwich, etc) are 8-10 euros and filling.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Try the Seitan Sandwich... it's DELICIOUS! And the peanut butter brownie cake is to die for. Try to order one as a birthday cake: best birthday cake ever!

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Lovely staff and delicious vegan food! Best fries I've had in a long time üåü

Name: Dophert
Review Text:
Tasty and creative vegan sandwiches and deserty. We loved it!
The only minus is that there are no windows in the part of the restaurant where you sit. But the food makes up for it.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: This is a small place in the Spaarndammerbuurt. Often overlooked and off the beaten path, this area is very much a hotspot for good food today.  Dophert serves all vegan dishes, snacks and drinks. Try the "bitterballen" with mustard for a great afternoon snack or the vegan milkshake.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Absolutely delicious!!! Had the quinoa burger and it was amazing. Also took the granola bowl and that was also great

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Went to Dophert for a nice lunch, turns out their service exceeded my expectations! Super friendly waitress, phenomenal meal, and tranquil atmosphere. A great deal too, cant wait to come back! Happy times

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Little gem in a quiet part of Amsterdam. Specialised in vegan food. Great desserts!

Name: Dophert
Review Text: The place is lovely and with super friendly staff! The cakes and desserts are awesome. However , they used to have some really nice burgers that are not on the menu anymore. Although the food is still very good, I missed them! P.s.: wasn't really amazed by the milk shake, just a cream mix with fruit/ice.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: We motivated ourselves to go to that vegan place and that was such a good surprise. Croissant are delicious and I am originally from France. Scrambled tofu are also very tasty so was the club sandwich. All of this with vegan latte and fresh ‚Ä¶

Name: Dophert
Review Text: The burgers and fries were very delicious! But as we arrived, the kitchen closed for about 1,5 hours, so we had to come back later again (we've googled before). But nevertheless it is an awesome vegan restaurant.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: This is a very cozy place to have lunch, coffee, smoothy, and a pice of cake. Everything is tasty and vegan. Time to time they change a bit their menu but you can be sure it will be something yummy. It's also possible order to take away, ‚Ä¶

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Perfect place for lunch and diner. Burgers are amazing, dont forget to ask for sweet potato fries! I never eat cake but can't ever leave without a slice of their chocolate peanut butter fudge.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Cosy cafe with delicious food and cake. I ordered the BLT on the advice of the waitress and it was great. It was so cosy I stayed for hours! The lemon and vanilla cheesecake was so so good. I‚Äôm thinking about going back again today! Yum :) you gotta visit

Name: Dophert
Review Text: DopHert serves all-vegan breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and drinks. We enjoyed a burger and a bagel as lunch, both with a creative take on 'substitute' meat and fish. The cakes at the counter looked amazing, but unfortunately we were already full. Will definitely come back for some sweets one day!

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Fantastic service. The staff is super cool and speak fluent English. The vegan version bitterballen was super interesting and was hard to understand it's flavour. Splendidly crispy on the outside and really thick soya +possibly flour paste inside. Looking out for their signature vegan dophert burger too!

Name: Dophert
Review Text:
Loved all the dishes that I tried from the burgers to the nachos the jewel in the crown however was the bibimbap.
Being vegetarian I felt very comfortable with the cleanliness of the kitchen and the food served was animal free.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Friendly and chilled. Not a huge menu-could do with some more snacks. Bitterballen were really tasty and the vegan cheesecake is one of the best I've tasted

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Lovely place for nice food and drinks with very friendly service! Recommend

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Incredibly friendly service, great food and recommendations and flexibility if any dietary issues.  Amazing desserts too!  A vegan MUST in Amsterdam!

Name: Dophert
Review Text: This place serves very good vegan food. The burger with the fries were very delicious! They also serve vegan cake and pies.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: The food never disappoints, in fact, I think they're one of the best vegan places I've ever eaten at but don't go here expecting quick service, you'll wait at least 40 minutes for your food..

Name: Dophert
Review Text: My favorite vegan place in Amsterdam. They have burgers, fries, donuts (and also healthy options :)). Highly recommended for a visit.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Delicious vegan sandwiches and burgers. Perfect for lunch and dinner. It's a cozy establishment with friendly staff.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Delicious vegan food! The no tuna sandwich is so yummy! Service was very wonderful and the staff was super friendly

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Have had the tastiest healthy clubsandwich and carrotcake in the world here. Also bought a great t-shirt and BWC lipstick. Great location too here. I will come back again and again and ...

Name: Dophert

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Perfect place for vegan food! The healthy kind. It's one of the oldest vegan restaurants in the world ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Fantastic food with great service! We had a club sandwich and Non Tuna melt, with chocolate milkshake that I really recommend!

Name: Dophert
Review Text: The place to be for vegans. I like their sweet potatoes fries. Their seaweed burger is also my favorite.

Name: Dophert
Review Text: I absolutely love this place. Food is amazing, they have good coffee, staff is lovely

Name: Dophert
Review Text: Don't be fooled by the reviews, this place is not worth your money. There are plenty of other vegan alternatives that are.

Review Text: Very cosy place, very friendly staff and delicious food. The pancakes in the weekends are recommended ü•û
